summary: "Supernatural" is an American TV show created by Eric Kripke that started in 2005. It follows brothers Sam (Jared Padalecki) and Dean Winchester (Jensen Ackles) as they hunt supernatural creatures like demons and ghosts. The series was filmed in Vancouver and became very popular, running for 15 seasons with 327 episodes. It ended in 2020, making it the longest-running American live-action fantasy TV series.
title: Supernatural (American TV series)
